title: INVENTORY / MAP OF MARTINAISE
description: because the map is possibly a readable items, it might need some sort of an interaction dialogue?

dialogueTree.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "The worn map features the patchwork..."
dialogueTree.text: The worn map features the patchwork grid of the streets of Martinaise, with directions to appropriately *tourist-y* locations. Year '48 resides on the upper-right corner.

links.title: You: "Trace a path through the grid."
links.text: Trace a path through the grid.

links.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "Your finger moves through the vario..."
links.text: Your finger moves through the various streets, across Rue de Saint-Ghislaine and Rue Saint-Cispare, over Saint-Brune and Martinaise North...

links.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "...finally coming to a halt on the..."
links.text: ...finally coming to a halt on the spot where you are currently standing, although the map gives no such indication itself.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "For a more detailed view of the Map..."
links.text: For a more detailed view of the Map, go to your JOURNAL and select the MAP tab.
